front.title: Architecture for Fast EAP Re-authentication based on a new EAP method (EAP-FRM) working on standalone mode

abstract.t: This document describes an architecture aimed for reducing the latency of network access authentication based on the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP). The architecture is based on the design of a new EAP method for which a standalone authenticator is used, and does not require any change to the EAP specification or the specifications of existing EAP lower-layers.
